summary: Anti-corporate activists travel from conference to conference, impersonating member of the World Trade Organization.
cast: Mike Bonanno|Andy Bichlbaum|Michael Moore|Marco Deseriis|Wago Kreider|Patrick Lichty|Matt McElligott|Ryan McKinley|Laura Nix|Bob Ostertag|Sal Salamone|Phil Bayly|Andreas Bichlbauer|Philip De Lorenzo|Greg Palast
director: Directors: Dan Ollman, Sarah Price | 1 more credit »
title: The Yes Men
